column2: Foundations of CS, symbolic computation, early AI (rule-based systems), formal methods, programming language theory
Rise of deep learning, convolutional neural networks, natural language processing, computer vision, reinforcement learning
Refinement of deep learning architectures, transformers, attention mechanisms, NLP applications, generative models (GANs)
